TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FocusChangedHandler(object o, FocusChangedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed FocusChangedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the FocusChangedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the FocusChangedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the FocusChangedHandler is removed from the event.
